name: Horizon Aviation
about: Horizon Aviation is a premier flight training institution offering comprehensive programs for Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor (CFI) certifications. Located at Falcon Field Atlanta Regional Airport in Peachtree City, Georgia, and Baldwin County Regional Airport in Milledgeville, Georgia, we provide a safety-focused training environment with experienced instructors, many of whom are former private jet and airline pilots. Our training follows an FAA-approved syllabus, ensuring students receive high-quality instruction. We also cater to international students, assisting with necessary government approvals and visas. With a strong record of student success and flexible scheduling, Horizon Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. Our commitment to excellence and personalized training makes us an ideal choice for those seeking a professional and supportive learning environment.
